### Install packages

```{r echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
library(janitor)
library(here)
```

### Write data to csv file

```{r}
write.csv(penguins_raw,here("data","penguins_raw.csv"))
# Puts in folder "data" and names file "penguins_raw.csv"
```

### Make a function to clean up data

```{r}
cleaning_penguin_columns <- function(raw_data){
  raw_data %>%    # piping function allows commands to be chained
    clean_names() %>%   # cleans up from janitor package
    select(-comments) %>%   # select function used to remove columns
    select(-starts_with("Delta"))
}
```

### Use cleaning function and view results

```{r}
penguins_clean <- cleaning_penguin_columns(penguins_raw)

colnames(penguins_clean)
```
